Night Shift covers his tracks with Scorponok.

"That's true, but I know Tuc=
son, he'd risk that just ta keep it from gettn' stolen."

Night Shift had a=
lways had a close bond with Tucson, and whenever something changed for an A=
utobot, as one of their own he too felt the change.  A small lighted icon c=
omes up on an LED display on his right wrist. The Autobot insignia.  He kee=
ps it covered for a moment and looks down to it. It blinks off quickly.  He=
 thinks to himself.

" I'll be slagged..  That light only comes on when....=
 When...  When a Prime acknowledges his pressense.."

He thinks quietly to =
himself. He quickly douses the signal so is not to let anyone onto what he =
sense has just happened.  He then looks to Scorponok.

" I got more info fo=
r you guys.  But we better not talk out here.  Think we could go inside'n t=
alk about it there?  Where no Autobot or Maximal can reach us?"
